title: Linux Server Monitoring
description: A pre-configured Linux monitoring solution using Docker.

env.name: SMARTCTL_INTERVAL
env.label: How often to poll devices for SMART status

env.name: PROMETHEUS_RETENTION_TIME
env.label: How long to store metrics data in Prometheus

env.name: PROMETHEUS_RETENTION_SIZE
env.label: Largest size to allow Prometheus data to grow before trimming

env.name: PROMETHEUS_ENABLE_REMOTE_WRITES
env.label: Enable Prometheus API endpoint accepting remote write requests

env.name: PROMETHEUS_SERVER_PORT
env.label: Mapped port for the Prometheus web portal and API endpoint

env.name: GRAFANA_WEB_PORT
env.label: Mapped port for the Grafana website on the host
